Text:
The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many tongues?  
 Do we speak? 
 Does AI know what your ancestors felt?

Can bots translate  -
 The taste at the tip of a tongue? 
 The fragrance of a wildflower? 
 The caress of wrinkled hands? 
 Tears of joy; ripples of laughter?

The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many hands? 
 Hold us afloat? 
 Does AI know how compassion feels? 
 Can bots heal?

Hold us up! 
 Hold us in!

Hold us down ! 
 Don't ask us what's wrong . 
 Don't ask us what's right.

Hold us up.
 Hold us down. 
 Keep us down. 
 Don't ask us what's wrong. 
 Don't ask us what's right

Hold us up. 
 Hold us down. 
 Don't ask us what's new. 
 Don't tell us what is out there.
THINK: Can “a pen, a book, and a teacher” change the world?
